means: （尤指在协议或建议中）规定，约定，讲明（条件等）

sentence.Network_en: Some manufacturers stipulate the price at which their goods are to be sold.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些制造商规定出售他们生产的商品的价格.

sentence.Network_en: International rules stipulate the number of foreign entrants.
sentence.Network_cn: 国际规则规定了外国参赛者的人数。

sentence.Network_en: Each time we stipulate what temperature we have in mind.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们每次约定谈什么样的温度便可.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 定_百度百科 ... （10） 确定[ determine] （12） 规定[ stipulate] （14） 约定签定，缔结[ agree to].
雅思英语完整版_馆档网 ... sting 刺；刺痛 stipulate 规定，约定 stock 存货；供给；股票 v.供应.
考博英语词汇 ... sting n. 刺，叮；刺痛 v．刺，叮螫；刺痛 stipulate n. 规定，订定 stir v. 动；搅拌，搅动;激动；轰动 n．激动；.
126、conveyance 运输输水运输工具127、stipulate 规定保证128、interim 暂时的间歇的/中间时期暂定.

China's law stipulates that prisoners who really show repentance and have rendered meritorious service can , upon rulings of the people's courts , have their sentences commuted or be on parole .中国法律规定，对确有悔改和立功表现的罪犯，经人民法院裁定分别给予减刑、假释。
规定一轮（Stipulated Round）包括除非经委员会特别决定，应按照球场正常球洞顺序打球。规定一轮的洞数是18洞，如少于该数目应 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin stipulat- 'demanded as a formal promise', from the verb stipulari
late 18th cent.: from Latin stipula (see stipule) + -ate

entry.def: If you stipulate a condition or stipulate that something must be done, you say clearly that it must be done.

example.ex: She could have stipulated that she would pay when she collected the computer...
example.tran: 她本可以要求她来取电脑时付钱。

example.ex: International rules stipulate the number of foreign entrants.
example.tran: 国际规则规定了外国参赛者的人数。

means.word_mean: 1. specify as a condition or requirement in a contract or agreement; make an express demand or provision in an agreement;

sentences.sentence: "The will stipulates that she can live in the house for the rest of her life"
"The contract stipulates the dates of the payments"

means.word_mean: 2. give a guarantee or promise of;

sentences.sentence: "They stipulated to release all the prisoners"

means.word_mean: 3. make an oral contract or agreement in the verbal form of question and answer that is necessary to give it legal force

auth_sentence.content: The authorities could stipulate a conversion rate for the currencies.
auth_sentence.res_content: The authorities could stipulate a conversion rate for the currencies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The authorities could stipulate a conversion rate for the currencies.

auth_sentence.content: I am prepared to stipulate that the worst fears are valid.
auth_sentence.res_content: I am prepared to stipulate that the worst fears are valid.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am prepared to stipulate that the worst fears are valid.

auth_sentence.content: Contracts should also stipulate how the payment to the caregiver will be made.
auth_sentence.res_content: Contracts should also stipulate how the payment to the caregiver will be made.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Contracts should also stipulate how the payment to the caregiver will be made.
